title: Improve autograd memory usage
body_html: References to tensors given to save_for_backward() and mark_non_differentiable() weren't freed if the function didn't require gradient. This lead to an increased memory usage when large parts of graph didn't require grad (e.g. ResNet-152 finetuning with batch_size 16 used to consume the same amount of memory as batch 256 after this commit).
